General.Name: Northcliff Resources Ltd
General.Description: Northcliff Resources Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, acquires, explores, and develops mineral projects in Canada. Its primary mineral project is the Sisson Tungsten-Molybdenum project covering an area of 14,140 hectares located in New Brunswick, Canada. The company was formerly known as Cabre Capital Corp. and changed its name to Northcliff Resources Ltd. in June 2011. Northcliff Resources Ltd. was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1040 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4H1
